Secretary, RT&H advised NHAI to ensure that display boards related to fee are available at all the toll plazas: All the Project Directors are therefore directed to ensure that display boards related to fee are in place at all the fee plazas of Public Funded and BOT Projects: All   Project Directors are further directed to submit the compliance report within a week's time from the date of receipt of this circular. All RO's are also requested to check during their site visits that proper display boards of fee rates are in place. {ID 28 0_ Tpaal Al) General Manager (CO) All Project Directors: CC 1 . All RO s.
